name: Vibeflow
summary: Human-in-the-loop AI orchestration system that coordinates modular agents across any external AI platform, with a real-time dashboard and strict safety/validation.
objectives: Deliver lean, observable AI-assisted development workflows
Avoid bloat and vendor lock-in with modular integrations
Keep humans in control of planning, approvals, and production gates
Continuously self-improve via Research and Maintenance agents
Minimize costs and maximize quality by routing tasks to best-fit platforms
techStack: External AI platforms (OpenAI, Gemini, Claude, DeepSeek, OpenRouter, local LLMs)

high: Directly improves orchestration, observability, safety, or task validation
Enables leveraging multiple AI platforms with no vendor lock-in
Provides actionable guidance for Research, Planner, Supervisor, Watcher, or Maintenance agents
moderate: General AI workflow insights adaptable to Vibeflow
Research or tools that could influence near-term strategy
archive: Interesting but not actionable within the next quarter
Conflicts with Vibeflowâ€™s lean, modular stance
Unrelated to orchestration or non-coder empowerment

promptHints.classification: Decide if the item is High, Moderate, or Archive usefulness for Vibeflow. Justify the rating using the PRD and criteria. Suggest next steps if useful.
